name: Dizzy Returns
blurb: A brand new Dizzy game by the original creators, The Oliver Twins. Help us create the best Dizzy game ever!

rewards.reward: FOLLOWER OF DIZZY: You'll receive a Kickstarter exclusive digital copy of Dizzy Returns for PC \u2022 Regular backer email updates, including developer diaries, meet the team interviews and video updates \u2022 Access to exclusive digital content (incl. posters and desktop wallpaper) \u2022 Our eternal gratitude for backing Dizzy!

SUPPORTER OF DIZZY: Access to exclusive digital game artwork (incl. concept art, character sheets, etc.) \u2022 Digital copy of the game soundtrack \u2022 Access to the Design Group, which will allow you to participate in game design decisions throughout the project \u2022 \u2018Supporter of Dizzy\u2019 credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

FAN OF DIZZY: \u2022 Access to the PC beta version of Dizzy Returns \u2022 Digital copy of the game design document  \u2022 Making of Dizzy Returns ebook, filled with gorgeous artwork, as well as insights into the design process \u2022 'Fan of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

DEVOTEE OF DIZZY: \u2022 An exclusive Dizzy Returns Kickstarter poster, designs to be chosen by you, the backers! \u2022 Digital copy of the Dizzy Returns in-game map \u2022 'Devotee of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

PROT\u00c9G\u00c9 OF DIZZY: An exclusive Dizzy Returns Kickstarter t-shirt, designs to be chosen by you, the backers! \u2022 A set of four Dizzy Returns concept art postcards \u2022 'Prot\u00e9g\u00e9 of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

FRIEND OF DIZZY: \u2022 Limited edition, Kickstarter only souvenir boxed edition of Dizzy Returns \u2013 retro style, complete with CD of the finished game and soundtrack \u2022 'Friend of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

ADMIRER OF DIZZY: \u2022 Private invitation to an on-line live monthly design session with members of the game team - put your questions directly to them! \u2022 Printed copy of the Dizzy Returns game design document signed by the Oliver Twins \u2022 'Admirer of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

SQUIRE OF DIZZY: \u2022 Printed hard cover copy of the Making of Dizzy Returns art book signed by the Oliver Twins \u2022 A limited edition custom Dizzy Returns USB stick loaded with the PC version, game soundtrack and more! \u2022 'Squire of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

DISCIPLE OF DIZZY: \u2022 An invitation to the private Dizzy Returns launch event (date TBD) \u2013 celebrate the game launch with the game team and the Oliver Twins! (Travel and accommodation not included) \u2022 Signed, limited edition Kickstarter certificate \u2022 'Disciple of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

WORSHIPPER OF DIZZY: \u2022 Ever wondered what you\u2019d look like as one of the Yolkfolk? A concept artist will Dizzy-fy a picture of you*, and you\u2019ll receive a one of a kind print of your caricature, as well as a .pdf version!  \u2022 'Worshipper of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

LORD / LADY OF DIZZY: \u2022 Be immortalised in the best Dizzy game ever! We will include your photo* along with your choice of caption* in an in-game gallery \u2022 'Lord / Lady of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

DEFENDER OF DIZZY: \u2022 Come and join the team in Leamington Spa for a day full of Dizzy! You'll meet the Oliver Twins who will guide you through the fascinating history of Dizzy, take a tour of the studio and gain exclusive access to the game in development before anyone else, as well as pick the brains of the Dizzy Returns development team! (Travel and accommodation not included) \u2022 'Defender of Dizzy' credit in the game  \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

KNIGHT OF DIZZY: \u2022 Appear in Dizzy Returns as an NPC! We'll design and name* an NPC character after you, who Dizzy will meet in-game. \u2022 'Knight of Dizzy' credit in the game \u2022 (+ previous rewards)

HERO OF DIZZY \u2022 In a face-to-face design session with the Dizzy Returns team and the Oliver Twins, you'll create a complete quest (including puzzles & items) to appear in the final game! Afterwards you'll be taken out to dinner by the Oliver Twins and key team members in Leamington Spa. Return travel (within UK only) and one night accommodation included \u2022 Hero of Dizzy credit in the game \u2022 (+ rewards \u00a32,500 and below)

LEGEND OF DIZZY: Become a part of Dizzy history! You'll work with the game team to create a new big baddy to rival Evil Wizard Zaks himself. We'll write your character straight into the story of Dizzy Returns and the lore of the entire Dizzy universe! Afterwards you'll be taken out to dinner by the Oliver Twins and key team members in Leamington Spa. Return travel (within UK only) and one night accommodation included \u2022 Legend of Dizzy credit in the game \u2022 (+ rewards \u00a32,500 and below)

MONARCH OF DIZZY: \u2022 Claim your rightful place in Dizzy Returns! Alongside the game team you'll design (and name*) the Lost Princess, a character who will appear in a very important quest in Dizzy Returns. Afterwards you'll be taken out to dinner by the Oliver Twins and key team members in Leamington Spa. Return travel (within UK only) and one night accommodation included \u2022 Monarch of Dizzy credit in the game \u2022 (+ rewards \u00a32,500 and below)
